TopicTitle: Soyuz problem chute "File download is available"

Articles.Content:
So, I had a very strange embarrassment. By creating a parachute on the Soyuz I ran into a problem in which the parachute opened sideways by about 45 degrees, but by making a few changes it was corrected, "I thought," but sending a parachute to test some people, they reported that the problem has not disappeared and parachute twisted and stands approximately 45 degrees horizontally, but the strangest thing that the same version of  my works good , I reinstalled KSP and checked it without addons but it still works properly, even though apponents is not fixed.

UNITY3D

Mee version/

Version of people inspection parachute\

 

Here SA capsule file and two parachutes, if anyone knows what's the problem, I will be very grateful .. 

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/3lxc8yylupi1lya/AADkg0nOu4zZo2za90qsfg_Qa?dl=0

Use a 1.0.5 stock squad chutes config as a base, this will fix it. (fixed it here as the version you provided had the 45° attitude for me. and after a re-write it was fine.

 

Probably, its just the missing bodyLiftMultiplier = 0 entry. but like we germans say "sicher ist sicher".
Cleaning KSP physics cache also helps. Found it while messing with my own chutes.
Thank you guys,really do not have enough "body Lift Multiplier = 0"
